text: Sergei Igorevich Loginov (; born 4 September 1963) is a former Russian football player. ==Honours== ;Dinaburg *Latvian Football Cup finalist: 2001 ==References== Category:1963 births Category:Living people Category:Soviet footballers Category:FC Dynamo Saint Petersburg players Category:FC Dynamo Bryansk players Category:FC Tekstilshchik Kamyshin players Category:Russian footballers Category:Russian Premier League players Category:FC Zenit Saint Petersburg players Category:FC Saturn Ramenskoye players Category:FC Znamya Truda Orekhovo-Zuyevo players Category:Dinaburg FC players Category:Russian expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in Latvia Category:Association football defenders
title: Sergei Loginov
